channel.title: Observer can't see rebound
channel.description: I observed when a Mercenary rebounded on another player but it showed up as the mercenary not visiting anyone. Not sure if this is intentional but it did throw the game off a bit. Not sure if this is working as intended but don't think it should be.

item.title: Observer can't see rebound
item.dc:creator: TryphonX
item.description:
Doesn’t sound right. @Ellie ^^

Read full topic

item.title: Observer can't see rebound

item.description:
I observed when a Mercenary rebounded on another player but it showed up as the mercenary not visiting anyone. Not sure if this is intentional but it did throw the game off a bit. Not sure if this is working as intended but don’t think it should be.
